amendment.description: Amendment protects the savings clause of title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act to ensure that nothing in Federal law can be construed to terminate or overturn a State or local collective bargaining law, memorandum or other agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to provide that nothing in this title shall be construed to alter or otherwise affect the rights, remedies, and procedures afforded to school or local educational agency employees under Federal, State, or local laws (including applicable regulations or court orders) or under the terms of collective bargaining agreements, memoranda of understanding, or other agreements between such employers and their employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
